text: I joke lightly, “What, are you two going to squeeze into one room?”
Alicia is taken aback for a moment, then lets out a soft laugh.
“You’re quite bold to say that.” She shakes her head, unable to hide the smile at the corner of her lips. “Don’t worry, we won’t interfere with your business.”
Lucia finally catches on and giggles. “Master! Lucia wants to share a room with you!”
“Ahem, upstairs.” Alicia clears her throat lightly, reaching out to pick up the basket of herbs.
She glances back at me once. That look is no longer cold, but carries a hint of warmth and playful teasing.
The hearth crackles softly, and a faint scent of herbs still lingers in the air.
